title: Plate, "4058", ca. 1830
markings:
Marks: A,B,C,D,E,G,H: "Late Spodes Felspar Porcelain", surrounded by "Copeland & Garrett". 
F, no mark
I,J,K,L: "Felspar Porcelain", in wreath above it: "Spode".
description: Circular form with scalloped edge and shallow well; wide rim glazed light blue, molded with five floral sprigs and scalloped edge, reserved in white; edge picked out in gilding; in center, a polychrome bouquet encircled by gilded vine motif, all on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "4058", ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. Bequest of Emily H. Chauncey. 1959-155-1-i.
